Structs/VolumeBarAnimation.html#/s:9Volu.name: slideAndFadeIn
Structs/VolumeBarAnimation.html#/s:9Volu.abstract: Fade in and slide down from above the status bar.

Structs/VolumeBarAnimation.html#/s:9Volu.name: slideAndFadeOut
Structs/VolumeBarAnimation.html#/s:9Volu.abstract: Fade out and slide up to above the status bar.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: height
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: The height of the bar that will be displayed on screen.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: edgeInsets
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: Insets from the top edge of the device screen.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: respectsSafeAreaInsets
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: Whether or not VolumeBar should respect safeAreaInsets when displaying.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: segmentCount
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: The number of segments that the VolumeBar is made up of.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: segmentSpacing
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: The number of points between individual segments in the VolumeBar.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: progressTintColor
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: The color of the progress displayed on the bar.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: backgroundColor
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: The background color behind the track view.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: likeInstagram
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: A volume bar style like Instagram, where the bar is a continuous progress view

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: likeSnapchat
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: A volume bar style like Snapchat, where the bar is a segmented progress view

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: fullWidthContinuous
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: A volume bar style that displays a continuous progress view and has minimal insets.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: leftOfNotch
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: A volume bar style that displays to the left of the notch on iPhone X.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.name: rightOfNotch
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html#/s:9VolumeBa.abstract: A volume bar style that displays to the right of the notch on iPhone X.

Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html.name: VolumeBarStyle
Structs/VolumeBarStyle.html.abstract: A value type wrapping parameters used to customize the appearance of VolumeBar.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC4.name: view
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC4.abstract: The stack view that displays the volume bar.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC2.name: minimumVisibleDuration
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC2.abstract: The minimum visible duration that VolumeBar will appear on screen after a volume button is pressed.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC5.name: start()
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC5.abstract: Start VolumeBar and automatically show when the volume changes.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC4.name: stop()
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC4.abstract: Stop VolumeBar from automatically showing when the volume changes.
